text: The women's 3000 metres event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 17 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Jebichi Yator ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Safa Aissaoui ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Siham Hilali ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 17 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Women's 3000 metres
